summary: The siblings Riitta and Anja love the same man, the treasurer Jyri Mara. Riitta ends up marrying Jyri, but when the couple loses their children Riitta gets jealous and mad.
cast: Regina Linnanheimo|Eero Paganus|Assi Raine|Annie Mörk|Paavo Jännes|Lauri Korpela|Kyösti Erämaa|Onni Hannukainen|F.E. Sillanpää|Helvi Järveläinen
keywords: pretending to be blind|romantic rivalry|vamp|two women one man|sister sister relationship
title: Mustasukkaisuus
